text.text: Best local live music venue in Singapore - house band rock rosettes kills it!  They totally rock ü§ò good times!

originalText.text: Best local live music venue in Singapore - house band rock rosettes kills it!  They totally rock ü§ò good times!

text.text:
Interesting to know that PULSE LIVE SINGAPORE is located in a 154-year-old mansion right in the heart of the city.

Join them Wednesdays through Saturdays for live music by local band GRAVITY and DJ Chris Columbus.

We had so much fun enjoying the live band performance and catching up over pretty cocktails and delicious food. Love the good vibes, great service and nice spacious interiors.

Highly recommended !!! üíï

text.text: Awesome place for a fun night out with your date or buddies! Large variety of drinks selection and the tacos were great too! Live band and DJ was super entertaining. Highly recommend for a fun night out in Clarke Quay!

originalText.text: Awesome place for a fun night out with your date or buddies! Large variety of drinks selection and the tacos were great too! Live band and DJ was super entertaining. Highly recommend for a fun night out in Clarke Quay!

text.text:
We had an incredible experience at Pulse Live at Riverhouse. The Gravity band was electric, bringing on palpable energy that pulsed through the crowd. The live music was lit, bringing on the crowd to sing and dance through the night.

Friendly and attentive staffs made sure that our table is well taken care of and our bellies happy. The food and drinks we ordered, I particularly enjoyed the sticky chicken wings which were juicy and flavorful. We enjoyed the drinks, frozen margaritas, and signature cocktails.

The atmosphere was vibrant and lively, with a stunning view of the river that added to the overall ambiance.

Overall, I would recommend Pulse Live to anyone who loves live music and good vibes. Great energy here, no doubt!

text.text:
Awesome night with my lovely girls! TGIF & fun night
Indulge in good vibes, pretty cocktails, savour delectable bar bites at PULSE. Where modern excitement meets timeless elegance

PULSE, The Riverhouse Singapore is a 154 year old conversation mansion nestled in the heart of Clarke Quay. üòç
